description: Situated in the elegant setting of the Nun hotel on the edge of Assisi’s historic centre, Benedikto serves typical Umbrian ingredients which are transformed into creative and imaginative dishes by talented chef Enea Barbanera. In fine weather, dinner is served on the romantic outdoor terrace with views of Assisi’s castle.
